type.description: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc

typeCode.description: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown

issuedBy.description: Internet of logistics identity code of issuing party.

key.description: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

ContactType.description: Contact type - e.g. Emergency contact, Customs contact, Customer contact…

Description.description: Contact description free text -  e.g. main, work, home, mobile phone, sales dept…

Method.description: Issuer of contact identifier - e.g. Phone, Email, Fax, Skype, Whatsapp, Viber…

ContactPoint.description: Contact coordinates - e.g. phone number, email address, etc.
